channel.title: Couple questions
channel.description:
I use testscape source idk y but i like it... 1 How do i make different buttons do different things, i meen like right click menu buttons, like a god book, has a few options, or a cannon, it has a few right click options, how do i control which one does what. 2. i need lists, my pc was fried and i wanna get back to it, i need gfx, animations, locations, interfaces, and ne other lists that may be useful 3. if any really advanced coders read this, i need to know how to send a command from one java app to another.
think thats it, thanks for any help i may, or most likely, may not receive.
